description: The Public Prosecutions Service of Canada requires the provision of reprographic services for the British Columbia (BC) region.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
===============

**Request for Proposal: Reprographic Services**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01012256
**Solicitation Number:** 1000031426

**Publication Date:** November 2, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 9, 2022 at 13:00:00

**Objective:**
The Public Prosecution Service of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide reprographic services in the British Columbia region. The selected contractor will be responsible for providing various reprographic services, including copying, short-run printing, binding, and scanning documents, as specified for each work request.

**Scope of Work:**

* Provide reprographic services to the Public Prosecution Service of Canada - British Columbia (BC) region
* Services must be provided during the working hours of the PPSC Vancouver regional office, Monday to Friday, from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Pacific Time
* Contractor must provide services for the PPSC-BC offices in Vancouver, including the main office and three sub-offices
* Services must be delivered and picked up from the designated PPSC office location

**Requirements:**

* Contractor must be able to provide Canadian goods and services
* Contractor must have the ability to work outside of core business hours, subject to the Annex B Basis of Payment and written approval by the PPSC Project Authority

**Duration of Contract:**

* The period of the contract will be from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2026, with options to extend for two one-year periods under the same terms and conditions

**Important Documents:**

* Request for Proposal (RFP) document in English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/1b5ff6c7ab27c08cc981f90cf953dfc6/2-_ppsc-_rfp_1000031426.eng_.pdf>
* Request for Proposal (RFP) document in French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/fd2db10b74c895104b0d90acbff32b58/1-_avis_de_projet_de_marche_-_1000031426.pdf>
* Notice of Proposed Procurement in English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/ad197
